name: RUNDOWN CRYPT
description:
Enter The Crypt

Young little Richard has been causing trouble for the town for quite a while. A citizen took the situation into his own hands and was about to deliver extreme consequences to the child head-on. The kind king intervened and made the decision that if the child can clear the nearby cavern of the monstrosities that lurk in the shadows, he will be able to enter the city walls once again.

Enter the cavern, avoid the floor holes, destroy the monstrosities with your handy slingshot and prove your worth to the town.

Instructions

Move - WASD

Dash - Space

Left Click - Shoot (Hold for a further shot)

Interact - E Key

Credits

Game Created by: Tiffany Nguyen & Nancy G.

Programmer: Tiffany Nguyen

Level Designer and 3D Modeler: Nancy G.
